movie.title: BKO: Bangkok Knockout
movie.writer: Dojit Hongthong (screenplay), Panna Rittikrai (story), Jonathon Siminoe (screenplay)
movie.actors: Sorapong Chatree, Kerttisak Udomnak, Krittiya Lardphanna, Supakson Chaimongkol
movie.plot: A group of "fight club" friends, whose styles vary from Muay Thai, Capoeira to Kung Fu and Tai Chi, must join forces and fight for their lives in a daring rescue of a kidnapped friend.
